name: 20-Second Riddler
description:
Have you ever wanted to experience the feeling of solving a riddle in the mere seconds before the walls close in? Now you can. Play with mouse and use the keyboard for word input, as you are given 20 seconds to answer a random riddle.

20-second Riddler was made for the 20 Second Game Jam. 

-----

Credits:

  • SFX: ivy
  • Music: Chris Logsdon
  • Font: New Hi-Score (BSL)
  • Background: Digital Moons
  • Riddles found on r/Riddles and The Thieves Guild
  • Concept, coding, and other image assets by me (CSVidal)
